items.preText: Didar: "Rashid Khan may come in next. He might be the X factor that Afghanistan will need now. I'm a Bangladesh fan."
items.text: turning across him from leg stump, and defended back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full outside off and he nudges it fine to third man. The man inside the circle has to sprint to retrieve it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 2 runs

items.text: length on the stumps, he goes back and punches it, but straight to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: length on off and he stays back to punch to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: dropped it short, and he pulls it in front of square but without any timing
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off, he plays with soft hands towards midwicket and they run two
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.preText: Mashur: "The match is yet to go miles but for the frustrated BD fans like me it's such a relieving one so far! We were about to be sleepless at night after those two incompetent matches! Hope tigers keep control till the end of the game."
items.text: gives it some air, and the batsman comes down to drive it, but straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: flatter outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: goes straight with the arm, angling into the pads, he still can't go past the in-field
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: uses his feet again, but can only pat it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: angling into his pads and he tries to whip it - but once again to a fielder. This time to square leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: finally finds a gap came down the track again and met the ball on the full outside off, managed to pierce the off-side field and timed it well enough too. Much needed boundary for Afghanistan
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: goes for it, coming down the track, but luckily for him didn't make such good contact and it didn't carry to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: stays back in his crease and pulls it with great force. It wasn't that short, but because he was ready for it, he got it away to the deep midwicket fence
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: takes a step forward and taps it past the bowler to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: comes down the track again, but Shakib slows it down and flights it. He waits and cuts to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: full on off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on the pads, worked away to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: Wajid Jawaid: "If Afghanistan loses today they will be out of the running for the final. This will be heart-breaking for the team that promised so much in the group stage. Rooting for Afghanistan as a neutral fan"
items.text: given some air, full on the stumps and the batsman toe-ends it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: some air again, outside off, he pushes it down to long-off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, and he turns it straight to short midwicket. Loud call for 'NO' to the single.
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: tossed up and full, he clips it but again to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: misses out short and down legside, that was begging to be put away, but he only gets a glove on it past the keeper to fine leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: keeps it full on off this time, and is tapped down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.preText:
The Fizz is back

Naveed: "Mashur, in Twenty20 era, 136 needed off 19 overs with 7 wickets remaining on a UAE track actually means the batting team are in control. Bangladesh are not in control. "

Rtruth: "What happened to the name stanikzai??? (Been asking this frm cricinfo since forever and still curious)" - and we've been answering forever too! He's changed his surname to 'Afghan'
items.text: back of a length on off, tapped into the offside and they go through for a quick single. Asghar ran into the stumps at the non-striker's end
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, 1 run
